page.title: 06CLUBS
page.content: There are a lot of clubs in Mendlesham. These are some of them. BOWLS CLUB They have their green opposite the playing field. The club has about forty members made up of men and ladies. They play on Monday evenings.A team of twelve play in blocks of four. There are three players in each block. Each player plays with two bowls. The club is in the Stowmarket league. There is no age limit for members. DARTS CLUB This comes from the public house team which is made up of nine players and they play teams from other public houses mostly in the winter months. Unlike bowls they do not have a mixed team but they do have a separate ladies team.
